name: LosAngelesCountySheriff,FireandAircraft
0:
”Alexa, open l. a. scanner”
”Alexa, ask l. a. scanner for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start l. a. scanner”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: l. a. scanner
des:
Live audio from Loss Angeles. 
 Covers police, fire, dispatch, aviation, and more. 
 Because this stream is live, large moments of silence will occur. 
 According to the Broadcastify page, "LASD, LACoFD, CHP, USFS/ANF, and Aircraft. Service area covers Castaic, Valencia, Stevenson Ranch, Saugus, Newhall and Valle Verde. Any major events that arise in Los Angeles County will also be monitored. Scanner equipment provided by K6VNY.”
This skill will let you listen in when things are happening in your area. You simply will tell Alexa to Launch L A Scanner and you will hear a short 30 or so second ad and it will connect you live to the happenings. Note that there is about a 2 minute delay. 
 This skill was made with love in Jesus name.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
